koohiiStory1: Your breath brings oxygen in through your nose which is then pumped around your body by your heart.
koohiiStory2: I think I´ve met my dream girl, but there´s a problem. her breath is horrible! So, do I listen to my nose or my heart?
words:
子息(しそく): son
消息(しょうそく): news, letter, circumstances
窒息(ちっそく): suffocation
一息(ひといき): puffy, a breath, a pause, an effort
利息(りそく): interest (bank)
息(いき): breath, tone
休息(きゅうそく): rest, relief, relaxation
溜息(ためいき): a sigh
息子(むすこ): son
